r.s: Provides an easy way to perform HTTP requests
r.d: Supports GET/POST/HEAD/TRACE/PUT/DELETE, Basic authentication, Proxy, Proxy Authentication, SSL, file uploads etc.
r.n: * Notice was raised when processing a response containing secure cookies (bug #2741) * Warning was raised when processing a response with empty body and chunked Transfer-encoding (bug #2792) * Improved inline documentation on constructor parameters (bug #2751)
